definition: in astrology, a circular diagram representing the 12 zodiacal constellations and showing their signs
details:
noun
- in astrology, a circular diagram representing the 12 zodiacal constellations and showing their signs
= example: in astrology, a circular diagram representing the 12 zodiacal constellations and showing their signs
- a belt-shaped region in the heavens on either side to the ecliptic
= example: a belt-shaped region in the heavens on either side to the ecliptic
